name: Create a vendor packing slip with all the required details

steps.name: Given I visit the NYB admin website and log in as a user with create, edit, and view access,
Navigating to the admin site: https://uat.nybdistributor.com:3000/
Login with 7550380274 as username and Lifo@123 as password
When I navigate to the Inventory module and verified the landing page URL,
Navigating to the inventory module > Create Inbound Inventory page
Verify the landing page Url
Then I choose the document type as "Vendor Packing Slip", select warehouse, and select vendor,
Vendor Packing Slip selected as document type
Indianapolis selected as warehouse
Add New Vendor selected as vendor
When I Enter packing slip number,
When I upload the packing slip,
When I add products,

added products:

                    Product6: Legendary Protein Tasty Pastry & Pop Tarts - Cookies & Cream - 10 Count

Submit button clicked
Then I verify the Invoice & Packing Slip landing page URL,
Verify the landing page Url
When I filter the document no,
Use Document No filter
